name: Goodberry
description: You create 5 magical berries that can restore health in combat. As a bonus action, you or an ally within 5 feet can consume a berry to regain 1d4+1 hit points. All berries must be used within 1 hour or they lose their magic.

material_component.focus_provided: Yew Wand provides unlimited tree-sap (still need pollen)
